Package managers

Class HolidayManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • managers.HolidayManager
  • public class HolidayManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller for the entity labelled Holiday. Contains the logic to link holidays to other classes.
    Since:
    2019-11-17
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    penel

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      HolidayManager()
      Checks if array list of holiday objects is null.

    • Constructor Detail

      • HolidayManager

        public HolidayManager()
        Checks if array list of holiday objects is null. If null, data from the csv file is written to the list.

    • Method Detail

      • listAll

        public void listAll()
        Lists all the movies in the database. Prints the name and date of holidays.

      • create

        public void create​(java.lang.String name,
                   java.time.LocalDate date)
        This creates a holiday and updates the database.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the holiday to be added.
        date - The date of the holiday to be added.

      • remove

        public void remove​(java.lang.String name)
        This removes a holiday from the database.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the holiday to be removed

      • isHoliday

        public java.lang.Boolean isHoliday​(java.time.LocalDate movieDate)
        Checks if given movie date falls on a recognised holiday in the records.
        Parameters:
        movieDate - Date of the chosen movie.
        Returns:
        Boolean value on whether the date is a holiday.
